p: The plant taxa cited by the informants were identified using the Flora Manual dels Països Catalans [ 22]. For systematic and nomenclatural aspects, we follow this quoted flora of the Catalan language area [ 22] for specific and infraspecific levels, and APG IV [ 50] for families. The herbarium vouchers have been deposited in the herbarium BCN (Centre de Documentació de Biodiversitat Vegetal, Universitat de Barcelona).
